description_en: Core CPI for 12 main groups of goods and services, consistent with the United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
description_ms: IHP teras bagi 12 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan, selaras dengan klasifikasi berpandukan United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
methodology_en: The index is compiled based on the average price change for Miscellaneous Goods & Services items collected according to price collection centers in each state in Malaysia.
methodology_ms: Indeks ini disusun berdasarkan perubahan purata harga bagi item Pelbagai Barangan & Perkhidmatan yang dikutip mengikut pusat pungutan harga di setiap negeri di Malaysia.
caveat_en: Core inflation measures changes in the prices of all goods and services, excluding volatile items of fresh food as well as administered prices of goods by the government.
caveat_ms: Inflasi teras mengukur perubahan dalam harga barang dan perkhidmatan, tidak termasuk makanan segar yang harganya tidak menentu serta harga barangan kawalan oleh kerajaan.
publication_en: [Consumer Price Index, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly consumer price statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on consumer prices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).
publication_ms: [Indeks Harga Pengguna, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik harga pengguna yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang harga pengguna](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).
